params.baseToken: Address of an ERC20 token contract used as the baseAmount denomination
params.quoteToken: Address of an ERC20 token contract used as the quoteAmount denomination

params.tokenA: Address of one of the ERC20 token contract in the pool
params.tokenB: Address of the other ERC20 token contract in the pool

returns._0: pool Address of the Algebra Pool

params.baseAmount: Amount of baseToken to be converted
params.baseToken: Address of an ERC20 token contract used as the baseAmount denomination
params.quoteToken: Address of an ERC20 token contract used as the quoteAmount denomination
params.secondsTwapInterval: Number of seconds in the past from which to calculate the time-weighted quote

returns.quoteAmount: Equivalent amount of ERC20 token for baseAmount Note: If a pool does not exist or a valid quote is not returned execution will revert

params.tokenA: Address of one of the ERC20 token contract in the pool
params.tokenB: Address of the other ERC20 token contract in the pool

getExchangeRate(address,address).notice: Converts quote amount to exchange rate and updates the pool as needed

getPool(address,address).notice: Retrieves stored pool given tokenA and tokenB regardless of order.

getQuote(uint128,address,address,uint32).notice: Get the time-weighted quote of `quoteToken` received in exchange for a `baseAmount` of `baseToken`, from the pool with highest liquidity, based on a `secondsTwapInterval` twap interval.

pools(address,address).notice: Mapping from currency to the pool address

setPool(address,address).notice: Sets the pool via algebra factory

userdoc.notice: Price feed based on Algebra V3 TWAP oracles.
